INSERT /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-MAINLY-REVIEW-INSERT*/ INTO f_investigation_mainly_review (owner, form_id, project_code, project_name, customer_id, customer_name, established_time, operating_term, legal_persion, org_code, living_address, actual_control_person, enterprise_type, work_address, is_one_cert, busi_license_no, tax_certificate_no, local_tax_no, loan_card_no, last_check_year, busi_scope, customer_dev_evolution, subsidiary_remark, participation_remark, correlation_remark, related_trade, related_guarantee, related_capital_tieup, busi_qualification, busi_place, query_time, loan_repay_situation_customer, loan_repay_situation_persional, other, raw_add_time) VALUES (#owner#, #formId#, #projectCode#, #projectName#, #customerId#, #customerName#, #establishedTime#, #operatingTerm#, #legalPersion#, #orgCode#, #livingAddress#, #actualControlPerson#, #enterpriseType#, #workAddress#, #isOneCert#, #busiLicenseNo#, #taxCertificateNo#, #localTaxNo#, #loanCardNo#, #lastCheckYear#, #busiScope#, #customerDevEvolution#, #subsidiaryRemark#, #participationRemark#, #correlationRemark#, #relatedTrade#, #relatedGuarantee#, #relatedCapitalTieup#, #busiQualification#, #busiPlace#, #queryTime#, #loanRepaySituationCustomer#, #loanRepaySituationPersional#, #other#, #rawAddTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-MAINLY-REVIEW-UPDATE*/ f_investigation_mainly_review set owner=#owner#, form_id=#formId#, project_code=#projectCode#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, established_time=#establishedTime#, operating_term=#operatingTerm#, legal_persion=#legalPersion#, org_code=#orgCode#, living_address=#livingAddress#, actual_control_person=#actualControlPerson#, enterprise_type=#enterpriseType#, work_address=#workAddress#, is_one_cert=#isOneCert#, busi_license_no=#busiLicenseNo#, tax_certificate_no=#taxCertificateNo#, local_tax_no=#localTaxNo#, loan_card_no=#loanCardNo#, last_check_year=#lastCheckYear#, busi_scope=#busiScope#, customer_dev_evolution=#customerDevEvolution#, subsidiary_remark=#subsidiaryRemark#, participation_remark=#participationRemark#, correlation_remark=#correlationRemark#, related_trade=#relatedTrade#, related_guarantee=#relatedGuarantee#, related_capital_tieup=#relatedCapitalTieup#, busi_qualification=#busiQualification#, busi_place=#busiPlace#, query_time=#queryTime#, loan_repay_situation_customer=#loanRepaySituationCustomer#, loan_repay_situation_persional=#loanRepaySituationPersional#, other=#other# where (m_review_id = #MReviewId#)

update /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-MAINLY-REVIEW-UPDATE-BY-FORM-ID*/ f_investigation_mainly_review set owner=#owner#, project_code=#projectCode#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, established_time=#establishedTime#, operating_term=#operatingTerm#, legal_persion=#legalPersion#, org_code=#orgCode#, living_address=#livingAddress#, actual_control_person=#actualControlPerson#, enterprise_type=#enterpriseType#, work_address=#workAddress#, is_one_cert=#isOneCert#, busi_license_no=#busiLicenseNo#, tax_certificate_no=#taxCertificateNo#, local_tax_no=#localTaxNo#, loan_card_no=#loanCardNo#, last_check_year=#lastCheckYear#, busi_scope=#busiScope#, customer_dev_evolution=#customerDevEvolution#, subsidiary_remark=#subsidiaryRemark#, participation_remark=#participationRemark#, correlation_remark=#correlationRemark#, related_trade=#relatedTrade#, related_guarantee=#relatedGuarantee#, related_capital_tieup=#relatedCapitalTieup#, busi_qualification=#busiQualification#, busi_place=#busiPlace#, query_time=#queryTime#, loan_repay_situation_customer=#loanRepaySituationCustomer#, loan_repay_situation_persional=#loanRepaySituationPersional#, other=#other# where (form_id = #formId#)

update /*MS-YRD-F-INVESTIGATION-MAINLY-REVIEW-UPDATE-BY-FORM-ID-AND-OWNER*/ f_investigation_mainly_review set project_code=#projectCode#, project_name=#projectName#, customer_id=#customerId#, customer_name=#customerName#, established_time=#establishedTime#, operating_term=#operatingTerm#, legal_persion=#legalPersion#, org_code=#orgCode#, living_address=#livingAddress#, actual_control_person=#actualControlPerson#, enterprise_type=#enterpriseType#, work_address=#workAddress#, is_one_cert=#isOneCert#, busi_license_no=#busiLicenseNo#, tax_certificate_no=#taxCertificateNo#, local_tax_no=#localTaxNo#, loan_card_no=#loanCardNo#, last_check_year=#lastCheckYear#, busi_scope=#busiScope#, customer_dev_evolution=#customerDevEvolution#, subsidiary_remark=#subsidiaryRemark#, participation_remark=#participationRemark#, correlation_remark=#correlationRemark#, related_trade=#relatedTrade#, related_guarantee=#relatedGuarantee#, related_capital_tieup=#relatedCapitalTieup#, busi_qualification=#busiQualification#, busi_place=#busiPlace#, query_time=#queryTime#, loan_repay_situation_customer=#loanRepaySituationCustomer#, loan_repay_situation_persional=#loanRepaySituationPersional#, other=#other# where ((form_id = #formId#) AND (owner = #owner#))
